title: Kongouji-San Is Annoying
alternative_title: Kongouji-san wa Mendou Kusai ; 金剛寺さんは面倒臭い
status: Kongouji-san wa Mendou Kusai ; 金剛寺さんは面倒臭い
description:
Description :
        There's no chink in this heroine's armour.  Whenever you open your mouth, all you receive is logical argument after logical argument. Kongoji is always right, annoyingly so. Yet Kabayama has found himself in love.

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 1: The Traffic Lights Are Changing
